EC%A1%B0%ED%9A%8C%22%20style%3D%22text%3BstrokeColor%3D%2336393d%3BfillColor%3D%23f9f7ed%3Balign%3Dcenter%3BverticalAlign%3Dmiddle%3BspacingLeft%3D4%3BspacingRight%3D4%3Boverflow%3Dhidden%3Bpoints%3D%5B%5B0%2C0.5%5D%2C%5B1%2C0.5%5D%5D%3BportConstraint%3Deastwest%3Brotatable%3D0%3BwhiteSpace%3Dwrap%3Bhtml%3D1%3BfontSize%3D16%3BfontStyle%3D0%3B%22%20vertex%3D%221%22%20parent%3D%226%22%3E%3CmxGeometry%20y%3D%22170%22%20width%3D%22140%22%20height%3D%2270%22%20as%3D%22geometry%22%2F%3E%3C%2FmxCell%3E%3C%2Froot%3E%3C%2FmxGraphModel%3E

1. Kiosk 객체를 생성
2. Kiosk 객체에 Menu(MenuItem)을 추가
(Kiosk 클래스의 addKioskMenu메소드 호출)
3. Kiosk 클래스의 Start 호출

userInput
메소드

Kiosk 클래스의
사용자의 모든 입력을 처리

UserCart에 저장된 MenuItem을 보여주고
MenuItem을 주문, 삭제를 진행
